snippet: Investigators said they uncovered a ring of airport truck drivers and security guards who helped steal over 100,000 miniature liquor bottles from flights at J.F.K.
abstract: Investigators uncover a ring of airport truck drivers and security guards who they say helped steal over 100,000 miniature liquor bottles from American Airlines flights at Kennedy International Airport; investigators believe the bottles were removed from the flights and resold to bodegas and delis in Queens.
lead_paragraph: Investigators said they uncovered a ring of airport truck drivers and security guards who helped steal over 100,000 miniature liquor bottles from flights at J.F.K.

headline.seo: Airport Workers Arrested in Theft of 100,000 Liquor Bottles
headline.main: 18 Are Arrested in Theft of Tiny Liquor Bottles
headline.print_headline: Arrests in Theft of Tiny Liquor Bottles
